name: Java
description: Java was the first language I learned, I have been working with him for 2+ years in web development and simple and small desktop applications. Maven/Spring/Hibernate.

name: Spring
description: Spring is my main working tool in Java. I have used it in backend develop of web pages based on microservices and monolithic. Spring Boot/Spring Cloud/Spring Data

name: Node Js
description: I have been working for about a year with Node Js. Mainly in the development of API Rest using the MERN Stack for backend web develop. NodeJS+ExpressJS

name: React Js
description: React is my main ally in frontend development. I use it developing beautiful, responsive and friendly interfaces with the help of libraries. Boostrap/MUI

name: Web
description: Although by preference I use libraries and frameworks. I also have knowledge in plain web development. HTML 5 / CSS / JavaScript

name: Python
description: I have basic knowledge in Python. I have used it in backend web development on REST APIs using Django and Flask also in small app development. Django/Flask

name: SQL DataBase
description: I have participated in the connection and management of SQL databases. I have knowledge in CRUD operations, creation, design and visualization of tables. MySQL/Postgresql

name: NoSQL DB
description: In my personal projects and study I have worked with non-relational databases. Especially with Mongo DB on the MERN stack. I have worked on its connection & management.

name: Cloud
